sentence.Network_en: The toaster remained on for more than an hour.
sentence.Network_cn: 烤面包机持续开了一个多小时。

sentence.Network_en: My lamp uses 60 watts; my toaster uses 600 watts.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的灯用60瓦, 我的烤面包器用600瓦.

sentence.Network_en: When I plugged in the toaster, the lights went out.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我把烤面包炉一插上电源, 电灯就熄了.

entry.def: A toaster is a piece of electrical equipment used to toast bread.

means.word_mean: 1. a kitchen appliance (usually electric) for toasting bread
2. someone who proposes a toast; someone who drinks to the health of success of someone or some venture

list.explanation: (音乐界用语)以散拍乐曲唱法演唱的人
